===Verb===

# to be [[accustomed]] to; to be in the [[habit]] of
#: {{zh-x|我 能 習慣 這樣 的 生活。|I could '''get used to''' this kind of life.}}

====Usage notes====
* Unlike Mandarin, {{lang|zh|習慣}}／{{lang|zh|习惯}} is rarely used as a verb in Min Nan; {{zh-l|慣勢|kòan-sì}} is used instead.
